# grantory_grant (Resource)
Manage the lifecycle of the `grantory_grant` resource.

## Example
```terraform
resource "grantory_grant" "database" {
  request_id = grantory_request.database.id

  payload = jsonencode({
    user     = "alice"
    password = "local-runner"
  })
}
```


## Schema

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `request_id` (String) Request identifier that owns this grant.

### Optional

- `payload` (String) JSON-encoded payload delivered by the grant when a request is approved.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
